vocabTerms.description: When you summon this, it gets its allegiance bonus if the top card of your deck matches its region.
vocabTerms.name: Allegiance

vocabTerms.description: Attacking with a support unit will buff the unit to its right.
vocabTerms.name: Support

vocabTerms.description: Highest Power, with ties broken by highest Health then highest Cost.
vocabTerms.name: Strongest

vocabTerms.description: Obliterate X non-champion cards from the bottom of your deck.
vocabTerms.name: Toss

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when the round ends.
vocabTerms.name: Round End

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when this unit attacks.
vocabTerms.name: Attack

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when a unit attempts to deal damage using its Power, either at the end of battle or with spells. Units with 0 Power can't strike.
vocabTerms.name: Strike

vocabTerms.description: Effect when unit Strikes the enemy Nexus.
vocabTerms.name: Nexus Strike

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when the round starts.
vocabTerms.name: Round Start

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when you play this unit from hand.
vocabTerms.name: Play

vocabTerms.description: In play, in hand, in deck, in discard, and even if created/summoned later.
vocabTerms.name: Everywhere

vocabTerms.description: If you don't have one, gain the attack token. (You can attack this round.)
vocabTerms.name: Rally

vocabTerms.description: Remove all keywords, abilities, and ongoing effects. Doesn't affect damage or subtype.
vocabTerms.name: Silence

vocabTerms.description: A card triggers its plunder ability when played if you damaged the enemy Nexus this round.
vocabTerms.name: Plunder

keywords.description: Completely removed from the game. Doesn't cause Last Breath and can't be revived.
keywords.name: Obliterate

keywords.description: A unit's spell-like effect that allows enemy reactions.
keywords.name: Skill

keywords.description: While attacking, it strikes both before AND at the same time as its blocker.
keywords.name: Double Attack

keywords.description: Lowest Power, with ties broken by lowest Health then lowest Cost
keywords.name: Weakest

keywords.description: The enemy can challenge this unit, forcing it to block.
keywords.name: Vulnerable

keywords.description: Get this effect when this unit attacks.
keywords.name: Attack

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by an Elusive unit.
keywords.name: Elusive

keywords.description: Heal our Nexus for the amount of damage dealt
keywords.name: Drain

keywords.description: Remove a unit from combat. It can't attack or block for the rest of the round.
keywords.name: Stun

keywords.description: Attaches to another card, trapping it. When the trapped card is drawn, perform the effect.
keywords.name: Trap

keywords.description: Inflicts damage beyond what would kill the target(s) to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: When I'm summoned, refill 1 spell mana.
keywords.name: Attune

keywords.description: Negates the next damage the unit would take. Lasts one round.
keywords.name: Barrier

keywords.description: Can't attack or block.
keywords.name: Immobile

keywords.description: A Captured card is removed from the game. It returns when the Capturing unit leaves play.
keywords.name: Capture

keywords.description: Set a unit's Power to 0 this round. It can be changed after.
keywords.name: Frostbite

keywords.description: Burst spells resolve instantly. The enemy can't act before it finishes.
keywords.name: Burst

keywords.description: Fleeting cards discard from hand when the round ends.
keywords.name: Fleeting

keywords.description: Fast spells can be played at any time, but allow the opponent to respond.
keywords.name: Fast

keywords.description: Excess damage I deal to my blocker is dealt to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: Get this effect when you play this unit from hand.
keywords.name: Play

keywords.description: While attacking, strikes before its blocker.
keywords.name: Quick Attack

keywords.description: Takes 1 less damage from all sources.
keywords.name: Tough

keywords.description: Return a unit to hand and remove all effects applied to it.
keywords.name: Recall

keywords.description: Heals fully at the start of each round.
keywords.name: Regeneration

keywords.description: Removes all text and keywords from a unit.
keywords.name: Silenced

keywords.description: Damage this unit deals heals its Nexus that amount.
keywords.name: Lifesteal

keywords.description: You're Enlightened when you have 10 max mana.
keywords.name: Enlightened

keywords.description: A champion levels up once this condition is met, even in hand or deck.
keywords.name: Level Up

keywords.description: Slow spells can be cast outside of combat and other casting. The enemy can respond.
keywords.name: Slow

keywords.description: The first time only Scout units attack each round, ready your attack.
keywords.name: Scout

keywords.description: This unit dies when it strikes or when the round ends.
keywords.name: Ephemeral

keywords.description: These abilities take effect when the unit dies.
keywords.name: Last Breath

keywords.description: Can choose which enemy unit blocks.
keywords.name: Challenger

keywords.description: These abilities trigger when you resolve a spell.
keywords.name: Imbue

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by enemies with 3 or more Power.
keywords.name: Fearsome
